about_the_game:
This simple game is a fast-paced VR RPG based FPS. You will be able to fight many across the game's universe while shooting down your enemies with precision and style.

The game has guns which you use to shoot and take down enemies and players. This RPG lets you team up with your friends and play with them in VR, all while dominating your enemies.
